\begin{tcolorbox}[title=Example,colback=PineGreen!2!, colframe=PineGreen]

Express $5\cos{2t}\degree-3\sin{2t}\degree$ in the form $k\sin{(2t+a)}\degree$ where $k>0$ and $0<a<360$.

\tcblower

\vspace{10cm}
\hspace{4cm}
\begin{tikzpicture}[remember picture, overlay, scale=0.5]
        \draw[white] (-8,0) -- (8,0);
        \draw (-1.5,0) -- (1.5,0);
        \draw (0,-1) -- (0,1);
        \node at (0.7,0.5) {A};
        \node at (-0.7,0.5) {S};
        \node at (-0.7,-0.5) {T};
        \node at (0.7,-0.5) {C};
        \node[PineGreen,above left] at (-0.7,0.65) {\scriptsize{$180\degree-\text{acute}\degree$}};
        \node[PineGreen,left] at (-0.7,0.5) {\ding{51}\ding{51}};
        \node[PineGreen,right] at (0.7,0.5) {\ding{51}};
        \node[PineGreen,left] at (-0.7,-0.5) {\ding{51}};
\end{tikzpicture}

\vspace{-4cm}
\hspace{8.3cm}
\begin{tikzpicture}[remember picture, overlay]
        \draw[thick,PineGreen,-stealth] (160:8) arc (160:200:8);
\end{tikzpicture}

\vspace{-7.6cm}
\begin{align*}
    5\cos{2t}\degree-3\sin{2t}\degree&=k\sin{(2t+a)}\degree&&\\[0.5em]
    5\doubleunderline{\cos{2t}\degree}-3\underline{\sin{2t}\degree}&=k\underline{\sin{2t}\degree}\cos{a}\degree+k\doubleunderline{\cos{2t}\degree}\sin{a}\degree&&\color{PineGreen}\longleftarrow \text{Expand }k\sin{(2t+a)}\degree\\[1.5em]
    k\sin{a}\degree&=5&&\color{PineGreen}\longleftarrow \text{Equate }\sin{2t}\degree\text{ coefficients}\\[0.5em]
    k\cos{a}\degree&=-3&&\color{PineGreen}\longleftarrow \text{Equate }\cos{2t}\degree\text{ coefficients}\\[1.5em]
    k&=\sqrt{(5)^2+(-3)^2}&&\color{PineGreen}\longleftarrow \text{Calculate }k\\[0.5em]
    &=\sqrt{34}\\[1.5em]
    \tan{a}\degree&=\frac{5}{-3}=-\frac{5}{3}&&\color{PineGreen}\longleftarrow \text{Find }\tan{a}\degree\\[0.5em]
    \text{acute}\degree&=\tan^{-1}{\left(\frac{5}{3}\right)}=59.0\degree &&\color{PineGreen}\longleftarrow \text{Find acute angle first}\\[0.8em]
    &&&\color{PineGreen}\longleftarrow \text{Positive }\sin{a}\degree\text{: quadrants A and S}\\[0.5em]
    &&&\color{PineGreen}\longleftarrow \text{Negative }\cos{a}\degree\text{: quadrants S and T}\\[1.5em]
    a\degree &=121.0\degree&&\color{PineGreen}\longleftarrow \text{Using }180\degree-59.0\degree\text{ (Double-ticked)}\\[1em]
    5\cos{2t}\degree-3\sin{2t}\degree&=\sqrt{34}\sin{(2t+121.0)}\degree&&\color{PineGreen}\longleftarrow \text{State solution}
\end{align*}

\end{tcolorbox}
